text: Angu Motzfeldt (born 1976) is a Greenlandic singer In 2002, his music appeared on the soundtrack to Inuk Silis's prize-winning film Eskimo Weekend. He appeared on the Danish TV series Forsvar as well. He also works in Greenland's Securitas company. == References == == External links == * Category:Greenlandic male actors Category:Greenlandic male singers Category:Inuit musicians Category:English-language singers from Greenland Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:21st-century Danish singers Category:21st-century male singers
title: Angu Motzfeldt
